mean_cn: n. 机能主义，机能心理学，实用第一主义
mean_en: idea that the most important aspect of something, especially the design of a building or piece of furniture, is how it is going to be used or its usefulness
word_etyma: function机能+alism...主义 → 机能主义
sentence: The functionalism of old factories gives them a strange kind of beauty.
sentence_trans: 破旧工厂的机能主义为它们带来一种奇妙的美感。
